General.Name: DB (International) Stock Brokers Limited
General.Description: DB (International) Stock Brokers Limited provides stock broking and depository participant services of CDSL in India. The company offers non-resident Indian services, such as equity and derivatives trading; mutual fund and initial public offering investment; and procurement of permanent account number cards and RBI permissions. DB (International) Stock Brokers Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: 114, New Delhi House, New Delhi, India, 110001
